parsing of decision tablesreduction in the size of decision tables can beaccomplished by several techniques the techniques considered in this paper are on the parsing of decisiontables with regard to horizontal and vertical data structures job identity hardware and job priorities,and context relationships such parsing rests upon some conventions for the linkage of decision tables.cacm august 1967chapin n.ca670807 jb february 27 1978 4:14 pm1548 4 15481548 4 15482220 4 15482726 4 15482726 4 15481488 5 15481489 5 15481548 5 15481548 5 15481548 5 15482220 5 15482492 5 15482518 5 15482598 5 15482616 5 15482726 5 1548931 6 15481172 6 15481172 6 15481172 6 15481237 6 15481327 6 15481327 6 15481354 6 15481354 6 15481488 6 15481489 6 15481489 6 15481548 6 15481548 6 15481548 6 15481548 6 15481548 6 15481548 6 15481684 6 15481684 6 1548250 6 15482220 6 15482220 6 15482221 6 15482263 6 15482263 6 15482453 6 15482517 6 15482691 6 1548
